subject: Implement Environment Parity System
description:
Create environment-aware behavior for dev vs prod:
1. Create /home/ken/developer-portal/src/lib/environment.ts
2. Add environment field to projects and api_keys tables
3. Define behavioral differences: rate limits (10x in dev), auto-suspend (no in dev), logging (verbose in dev), webhook retries (infinite in dev)
4. Implement getEnvironmentConfig() helper
5. Add environment selector in UI
6. Show clear environment indicators in project UI

Environments: prod, dev, staging with different rulesets.
